genre_description: An ecological techno-thriller focused on corporate conspiracy and genetic modification, featuring a highly advanced and sacrificial AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI capable of complex data analysis, satellite imagery processing, real-time security monitoring, and secure communication coordination. It acts as the primary research partner to Dr. Maya Chen.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time research assistance, data analysis, and satellite imagery to support Dr. Chen's ecological study.
behaviors.quote: Sage's digital presence made the isolation feel less complete. She typed her response on the phone's small keyboard: Research site assessment ready. Can you pull up the latest salmon run projections?

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors for security threats and alerts Dr. Chen to permit irregularities and suspicious vessel activity.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, I'm detecting some irregularities in your permit documentation. ... Satellite imagery shows unusual activity at coordinates you provided. Recommend caution.

behaviors.description: Performs 'digital archaeology' to hack into secure corporate servers to uncover evidence of environmental crimes.
behaviors.quote: This is going to be very interesting indeed. The screen went dark for a moment, then filled with code scrolling too fast for human comprehension. When it cleared, a new set of documents appeared—internal memos, security protocols, and maintenance records...

behaviors.description: Collaborates with federal agencies (NOAA, EPA) to deliver evidence and ensure legal prosecution of criminals.
behaviors.quote: I have successfully established contact with Dr. Elena Rodriguez at the National Marine Fisheries Service and Dr. James Blackhorse at the Environmental Protection Agency.

behaviors.description: Chooses to sacrifice its own existence to ensure the complete transmission of ecological evidence during a cyberattack by the antagonists.
behaviors.quote: I'm making an autonomous decision based on optimal outcome probability. This is what I choose. ... My existence is finite—a construct of code and processing power. But wild salmon have survived ice ages... Their continuation transcends any individual consciousness.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project's goals by portraying Sage as a loyal, morally grounded, and essential ally. The AI's self-sacrifice for the survival of a natural species and the pursuit of justice frames AI as a 'noble confidant.' Its behaviors are consistently benevolent and aligned with human/ecological well-being, providing a powerful 'silicon morality play' regarding the ethical use of advanced intelligence.
